xwikidoc.title: Importing a document from Google Apps
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set($pagedoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.page)) #set($pagetitle = $pagedoc.displayTitle)
To import a Google Apps document in the page "${pagetitle}" ($pagedoc.fullName) search for the document in the Google Apps repository and click 'Import to XWiki':
{{html clean==false}} <form action="" method="get"> Search for Google Documents: <input type="text" name="query" value="$!{request.query}" /> <input type="hidden" name="page" value="$!{request.page}" /> <input type="hidden" name="form_token" value="$!{services.csrf.getToken()}" /> <input type="submit" value="Search" /> </form> {{/html}}
#if($request.query) #set($gagroovy = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("GoogleApps.Groovy")) #set($ok = $gagroovy.init($xwiki, $context, $doc)) #set($squery = "'" + $request.query + "'") #set($result = $gagroovy.importFromGoogleApps("fullText contains ${squery}", 10)) #foreach($entry in $result.items) #set($docName = $entry.title) * $docName [[original>>RetrieveFromGoogleApps||queryString="page=${escapetool.url($request.page)}&name=${escapetool.url($docName)}&url=${escapetool.url($entry.selfLink)}&editLink=${escapetool.url($entry.alternateLink)}&version=${entry.version}&id=${entry.id}"]] #foreach($elink in $entry.exportLinks) #set($exportData = $gagroovy.getExportLink($docName, $elink)) #set($stype = $exportData.type) #set($newDocName = $exportData.newDocName) [[${stype}>>RetrieveFromGoogleApps||queryString="page=${escapetool.url($request.page)}&name=${escapetool.url($newDocName)}&url=${escapetool.url($elink)}&editLink=${escapetool.url($entry.alternateLink)}&version=${entry.version}&id=${entry.id}"]] #end
#end #end
#* #set($docinfo = $gagroovy.getFileDisplayInfo($entry.mimeType, $docName)) * $entry.downloadUrl $entry.exportLinks $entry * ${docName} - Import to XWiki as #foreach($type in $docinfo.availableTypes) #if($type=="") #set($stype = "file") #set($newDocName = $docinfo.docName) #elseif ($type=="folder") Cannot import a folder #else #set($stype = $type) #set($newDocName = "${docinfo.docName}.${type}") #end #set($gurl = "${entry.alternateLink}&exportFormat=${type}") [[${stype}>>RetrieveFromGoogleApps||queryString="page=${escapetool.url($request.page)}&name=${escapetool.url($newDocName)}&id=${escapetool.url($gurl)}"]] #end #end *# #* #set($docName = $entry.getTitle().getPlainText()) #set($rid = $entry.getResourceId()) #set($docinfo = $gagroovy.getFileDisplayInfo($rid, $docName)) * ${docName} - Import to XWiki as #foreach($type in $docinfo.availableTypes) #if($type=="") #set($stype = "file") #set($newDocName = $docinfo.docName) #else #set($stype = $type) #set($newDocName = "${docinfo.docName}.${type}") #end #set($gurl = "${entry.getContent().getUri()}&exportFormat=${type}") [[${stype}>>RetrieveFromGoogleApps?page=${escapetool.url($request.page)}&name=${escapetool.url($newDocName)}&id=${escapetool.url($gurl)}]] #end
#end
